message:
checkout my latest contribution on the twitter node client

https://github.com/desmondmorris/node-twitter/pull/17
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: It's a great contribution. I've a small note. Instead of repeating the same piece of code many times, you can put all events in an array & loop on it.

or i can do it like this this.emit(json.event,json) as twitter uses the same event names im using. how lazy am i :/
thanks dude :)
